The royal banners have been replaced entirely by intimidating crimson, embroidered fabric banners displaying Morgath's sinister sigil. The architecture is heavy stone, Gothic in style. This green luminescence strongly illuminates the immediate area, catching the texture of the iron thorns on Morgath's crown and reflecting sharply in her dark eyes. The background is deep, heavy shadow, emphasizing the book's magical source of light. Scene atmosphere is intensely focused and arcane.
